column5: V (5), N (14) - /m/ only syllabic following stress; hence, a suffix /m/ may be syllabic, but a prefix /m/ may not; syllabic /n/ is only found in kinship terms; assuming that kinship terms do not include affixes, an affix of shape /n/ is not syllabic
